summary: Dr. Alphonsus E. Okoli's medical license was suspended for a minimum of six months, followed by two years of probation, due to violating a prior probation order and continuing to prescribe controlled dangerous substances after his registration was revoked. He was also found guilty of unprofessional conduct and failing to maintain adequate medical records. Disciplinary actions include a permanent prohibition from prescribing CDS, a $5,000 civil fine, and a requirement to complete a medical documentation course.
